languageName.description: The long name for the language. How the name is written in its own language.

defaultLanguage.description: The language that should be used unless other is specified

fallbackLanguage.description: If there is a missing string for another language, use a string from this language instead

showDefaultLanguageInPath.description: If true, the default language will be shown in the website path. If false, the default language will not be shown in the path.

baseApplicationPath.description: The base path where the application is served. Should end with a slash (/). Example: '/' or '/myapp/'

apiUrl.description: The base url for the pxweb api

homePage.description: Homepage URLs for the logo link, mapped by language code. Keys should be language codes (e.g., 'en', 'sv', 'no').

additionalProperties.description: Homepage URL for the given language code.

maxDataCells.description: The maximum number of cells allowed to be shown in a table

showBreadCrumbOnStartPage.description: Set to true to show breadcrumb on start page
